text: Apurva Kasaravalli or Apoorva Kasaravalli is an Indian Adfilm maker and actor and director known for his work in Kannada cinema. ==Personal life== Apurva is the son of Girish Kasaravalli and Vaishali Kasaravalli, and brother of Ananya Kasaravalli. He studied at Christ University and did his Masters from University of Technology, Sydney, Australia. He is married to Vandana Supriya, who is an Odissi performer and choreographer. Apurva and Vandana run an NGO called "Anandi Arts Foundation" that works with children from underprivileged backgrounds.
